document_data.mainbody:
arcus Terrens, brother to Maggie Terrens, was a child who lived in the town of Moonhaven in the late 15 century DR.
Sometime before the Moonhaven was attacked and ruined by the goblin raiders of the Cult of the Absolute in the , Marcus was among the four children who had gone missing. Their names Marcus Terrens, Maggie Terrens, Mathen Deetch, and Rochelle Kirk. The missing childrens notice was still hanging on a wall as the village laid in ruins in the .
